title: Dare nimo Ienai Yoru wo Ageru
original_name: 誰にも言えない夜をあげる
sinopse:
Yui works at a department store but also secretly has a "night part time job." This violation of the rules is accidentally found out by Rihito. In exchange for keeping her secret, there is a thing that Yui needs to do for him...

Included one-shot: Kogareta Kimi e
